description: The major of Hiun City met with Burgh, Ash, Iris, Cilan and Officer Jenny (Isshu) to determine what course of action was required to solve the Fushide panic. After listening to their advice, he decided to wait until they could investigate further before implementing more drastic measures. His patience during the crisis proved to be a good decision as the Fushide panic was resolved by Burgh, Ash, Iris, Cilan and Trip who were able to calm down the Fushide and gather them together at the Central Plaza.
name: Hiun City no Shichou
